Sentencas: ZrO2 samples with 11% Nd and La doping and with 7, 9, 11, and 13% Gd doping have been prepared by co-precipitation route followed by sintering at 700 degrees C and 1100 degrees C, for potential application as high conductivity electrolytes in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: X-ray absorption spectroscopy of doped ZrO2 systems

Sentencas: The samples have been characterized by x-ray diffraction with laboratory x-ray source of Cu K-alpha radiation and extended x-ray absorption fine structure (EXAFS) spectroscopy measurement at Zr K edge with synchrotron radiation.
Titulo: X-ray absorption spectroscopy of doped ZrO2 systems

Sentencas: The XRD spectra have been analyzed to determine the structure of the samples and the EXAFS data have been analyzed to find out relevant local structure parameters of the Zr-O and Zr-Zr shells, viz., bond distances, co-ordinations, and disorder parameters.
Titulo: X-ray absorption spectroscopy of doped ZrO2 systems

Sentencas: The effect of change in ionic radius as well as concentration of the dopants on the above parameters has been thoroughly studied.
Titulo: X-ray absorption spectroscopy of doped ZrO2 systems

Sentencas: The experimental results, in some cases, have also been corroborated by first principle calculations of the energetics of the systems.
Titulo: X-ray absorption spectroscopy of doped ZrO2 systems
